descriptions.text: -${value}% chance to obtain Shrimp while training Music
+${value}% chance to obtain Shrimp while training Music
-${value} additional reward roll while training Music
+${value} additional reward roll while training Music

attacks.name: Lesser Prank
attacks.description: The enemy plays a prank on you and applies sleep for ${onHitEffect0turns} turn (Unavoidable). If you are already asleep perform a Normal Attack instead.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: <Attacker> plays a prank on you, <hitEffect> (<Avoidable>). If <target> <taris> already asleep perform a Normal Attack instead.

attacks.name: Prank
attacks.description: The enemy plays a prank on you and applies sleep for ${onHitEffect0turns} turn (Unavoidable). If you are already asleep perform a Normal Attack instead.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: <Attacker> plays a prank on you, <hitEffect> (<Avoidable>). If <target> <taris> already asleep perform a Normal Attack instead.

attacks.name: Greater Prank
attacks.description: The enemy plays a prank on you and applies sleep for ${onHitEffect0turns} turn (Unavoidable). If you are already asleep perform a Normal Attack instead.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: <Attacker> plays a prank on you, <hitEffect> (<Avoidable>). If <target> <taris> already asleep perform a Normal Attack instead.

attacks.name: Guitar Riff
attacks.description: An unavoidable attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}x${hitCount} damage over ${duration}s.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: An <avoidable> attack that deals <damage>x<count> damage over <duration>.

attacks.name: Face Melting Guitar Solo
attacks.description: An unavoidable attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}x${hitCount} damage over ${duration}s. On a hit, has a ${onHitEffect0chance}% chance to inflict Burn that deals ${onHitEffect0DamageMaxValue0}% of your current hitpoints as damage over ${onHitEffect0duration}s.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: An <avoidable> attack that deals <damage>x<count> damage over <duration>. On a hit, <hitEffect>.

items.name: Essence of Music
items.customDescription: Used to upgrade hired bard instruments. Unlocks a 5th modifier.

items.name: Polished Topaz Gem
items.customDescription: Can be socketed into hired bard instruments. Grants +5% Music GP.

items.name: Polished Ruby Gem
items.customDescription: Can be socketed into hired bard instruments. Grants +5% Music Skill XP.

items.name: Polished Sapphire Gem
items.customDescription: Can be socketed into hired bard instruments. Grants +5% Music Mastery XP.

items.name: Diamond String
items.customDescription: Can be applied to hired bard instruments. Grants +5% Sheet Music drop chance.

items.name: Pristine Leather
items.customDescription: Can be applied to hired bard instruments. Grants -5% Music Interval.

items.name: Mystic Oil
items.customDescription: Can be applied to hired bard instruments. Rolls an additional time for rewards while training Music.

items.name: Concert Pass Half (A)
items.customDescription: Used with Concert Pass Half (B) to purchase a Concert Pass.

items.name: Concert Pass Half (B)
items.customDescription: Used with Concert Pass Half (A) to purchase a Concert Pass.

items.name: Concert Pass
items.customDescription: When worn and training the Music skill, gain Skill XP per charge in the skills the instrument supports.

items.name: Mystic Essence
items.customDescription: Used to upgrade an Enchanted Guitar.
